Plot: Biopic of Mahavir Singh Phogat, who taught wrestling to his daughters Babita Kumari and Geeta Phogat. Geeta Phogat was India's first female wrestler to win at the 2010 Commonwealth Games, where she won the gold medal (55 kg) while her sister Babita Kumari won the silver (52 kg).
Title: Dangal
Actors: Aamir Khan, Fatima Sana Shaikh, Sanya Malhotra, Sakshi Tanwar
Writer: Piyush Gupta, Shreyas Jain, Nikhil Mehrotra, Rajshri Sudhakar (Dialogue Writer: Telugu), Nitesh Tiwari
